ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] New colors pretty - any good combo's?
ygData.msgSnippet: heh, i have everyone else s spells turned off.
ygData.messageBody:
heh, i have everyone else's spells turned off.

At 10:26 AM 8/12/00 -0400, you wrote:
>i had such a habit of hitting my run hotkey that i had to take it out so i
>would break the habit heh. now i have to break the habit of immediately
>hitting full screen as well.
>
>i used the eqcasters color wizard too, works really well. the only changes
>i made were to tone down the brightness of the guildchat green, slightly
>darken the ooc and auction green to make it easier to read in full screen,
>lighten up the tell and who colors for full screen as well, and make skill
>increases bright yellow so i don't miss em anymore. still need to find a
>good color for spells. i tried light blue, orange, i just can't find one i
>like since it is spammed so much from everyone else's spells. also hope
>they tell us what all those other id's are in the ini since it goes up to 32
>or so, or someone figures em out. my group loot and blue con is super dark
>blue and i can't read it at all.
>
>Shada Iceheart, L57 Wood Elf Bard
><Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr
